'''Beta 1.16.0.67''' is the seventeenth beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.0]], released on June 11, 2020,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360044839151|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.16.0.67 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|date=June 11, 2020}}</ref> which fixes bugs with account sign-in and multiplayer.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Server list]]'''
* Re-added Galaxite to the featured servers list.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that could occur when attempting to sign into Xbox Live / Microsoft account. ({{bug|MCPE-20548}}, {{bug|MCPE-64245}}) 
* Fixed a crash that could occur when attempting to sign in when offline. ({{bug|MCPE-29021}}) 
* Fixed various sign in and account linking issues on Nintendo Switch. ({{bug|MCPE-65511}}) 
* Fixed an issue that would sometimes prevent game invites from being sent/received correctly on mobile devices.</onlyinclude>
